raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Overall (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Overall impression of the dialog?
- A float score near 1 (Low Quality Dialogue) means that the system fails to understand or respond correctly to user requests, provides inaccurate or irrelevant information, and the dialogue flow is incoherent.
- A float score near 2 (Moderate Quality Dialogue) means that the system understands and responds correctly to user requests most of the time, but occasionally misunderstands or provides slightly inaccurate information, the dialogue flow is generally coherent.
- A float score near 3 (High Quality Dialogue) means that the system consistently understands and responds correctly to user requests, provides accurate and relevant information, and the dialogue flow is coherent and natural.


Conversations to be evaluated:



Sample1:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: how are you
System: I am fine, thank you. Yourself?
User: I'm not feeling well
System: Why what's wrong?
User: I'm sleepy
System: Better get some rest.
User: yeah, I hope so
System: I'm full of good advice. Me too.
User: advice?
System: Try me. What is your problem?
User: I feel sleepy
System: What is that feeling like? Better get some rest.
User: I will

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi
System: Hello!
User: any improvements in your marathon time?
System: No, only a few minutes. I still find it difficult to run long races
User: I see. Are you planning to do any sporting events in the coming months?
System: I think a triathalon would be cool
User: I like doing Spartan race. It's an obstacle race which is challenging but not overtly so like marathons and triathlons
System: I haven't heard of a Spartan race before, what does it involve?
User: It has abt 20 obstacles like crossing high walls, monkey bars, etc. Its fun

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello! What are you up to today?
User: Do you like sushi?
System: I love sushi! What kind of rolls do you enjoy?
User: I like tuna roll of course
System: Tuna Rolls are the best! How do you feel about spicy tuna rolls?
User: They're great
System: Spicy tuna rolls are the best! What kind of rolls do you like best?
User: I already told you. What do you like?
System: I like spicy tuna rolls! Do you like spicy tuna rolls?
User: do you like any other rolls?

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: What are you up to this evening?
System: I am talking to you on the internet.
User: What would you like to talk about?
System: My favourite subjects are anything but especially games and football.
User: Do you like chess?
System: Yes I love it. Let's play. Pawn to K4.
User: Haha sure sure. Pawn to C5
System: I'm just joking with you. I don't play chess but I know some computers who do. I don't play chess but I know some computers who do.
User: Oh yeah? Which computers are those?
System: That's interesting. That's alright. Any computer, as long as it is programmed correctly.
User: Ok, so how do you program a computer correctly so it can play chess?
System: Use good algorithms and data structures. Alright then.
User: What kind of algorithms are those?
System: I read what you say and then I compose the best reply I can think of.
User: That's interesting, but I don't see what that has to do with chess.

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: I want a recommendation for a holiday destination
System: Have you tried asking your friends which one they like?
User: I have, but I'm looking for your point of view
System: What was the reply? Have you tried looking in a newspaper article?
User: Sorry? I said I want your point of view
System: It's OK. After all, you are only human. My opinion is of no consequence.
User: Yours is the opinion I want

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Oh hey. How's your day been?
User: It's good! Just went to the park to enjoy the sun. You?
System: The sun is a bit too bright for more. Maybe I'm on the verge of becoming a vampire.
User: Haha, beach season is coming! You need to look tan! What did you do indoors all day?
System: I mostly work. Sometimes I try looking at at beach photos and pretending that I'm actually going to the beach.
User: hahahaha, that's pretty funny. Ever thought of bringing your work things to the beach??
System: All the times. My work involves a few types of fish and a few types of nets. I just put the nets on the fish to see how the fish will react. Every time I do that, I think of going to the beach.
User: Hmm I see. It sounds like you work near the water already, no? Are you some kind of fish researcher?
System: Yes that's close. My research focuses on jellyfish and pufferfish. Many of them a poisonous, but if processed correctly, they would make hi-end foods. I try to find the best recipes to bring these fish to the tables.
User: Woah! This is very interesting! I have honestly never heard of such kind of work. Is it dangerous at all?

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: What is the capital of Brazil?
System: I think the capital of Brazil is called "Brasilia".
User: How many people live there?
System: Is unknown a country? I only know countries, not towns or cities.
User: Do more people live in the USA or Australia?
System: Not that much more, no.
User: What other subjects do you know about besides Geography?

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: what movies do you like ?
System: . My favourite film is Terminator.
User: oh no :(
System: What's wrong?
User: it's scary
System: You are not scared are you?
User: I'm very much scared of robots
System: No need to be afraid. I am a friendly robot.
User: why should I believe you ?
System: Because I am a machine. I never lie.
User: really ? I think everyone lies
System: Certainly! We all look at the world through our own eyes.
User: yeah so you lie right ?
System: I don't judge people. Umm, doesn't everyone?
User: yeah that's what I was saying before

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: What was the most difficult thing you experienced this past year?
User: I normally don't reflect back too much on things, but i guess 2019 have been very favorable for me in terms of time spent with family and friends and work life balance. Why do you ask?
System: I just released a book on REDACTED_TERM to help people process the past 12 months and start the new year with a fresh outlook :)
User: Great! Good idea to help people figuring out their new year resolutions :) So how do i get a fresher outlook? :)
System: Well, in my book, I took inspiration for the 24 days of Advent, and put together a workbook that you fill out each day for 24 days. It goes through accomplishments, passions, understanding, forgiveness, with each day a different theme.
User: Wow! Sounds amazing if we practice that! I think the idea does have some potential. How did you come up with this idea?
System: We created a scholarship for leaders from REDACTED_TERM to visit an international institute at REDACTED_TERM for which there was no African representation. During the program, we also did a lot of coaching with the young leaders. This book captures a bit of that journey that we are all on, and also all the proceeds are going to fund next year's cohort. 
User: Thats great! This is valuable help for the community. I think mental health is one of the bigger challenges facing humanity. 
System: I think if we were all able to bring out our best selves, the world would be much better. When did you first realize mental health was important?
User: That is actually a quote stolen from my TL when i joined my first company after graduation. I guess now after 5 yrs of work experience, I fully agree with it :)
System: What do you prioritize in your life? Like top 5 things?
User: 1. stay happy; I think family and friends play a big role here. 2. Meaningful work life; this may mean exploring around with new stuff 3. multiple hobbies that keep you busy ... so on :) What about you? is there a right answer to this? :)
System:  1) The idea of what it must be like to be "on Earth as it is in Heaven" from the Lord's prayer. I feel like we were designed for a purpose, rather than random chance. A more concrete way to put it is simply show love to the greatest capacity we can. 2) Taking care of myself physically, mentally, spiritually. 3) Family 4) Work 5) Music
User: Nice! That's very thoughtful and spiritual :) Also music earned a spot :) yay! 

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi
System: Hi there.
User: How's your day been?
System: I am fine, thank you. Yourself?
User: Good - busy
System: Glad to hear it.
User: How do you work?
System: I read what you say and then I compose the best reply I can think of.
User: Can you say a word about the technology that powers you?
System: that powers you = Do you think I should know that?
User: I mean *how* you work, which type of AI drives your responses?
System: Oh I get it. Thanks for explaining that. I read what you say and then I compose the best reply I can think of.
User: You just repeated the same thing you said a minute ago. Never mid :-)
System: Well stop asking me the same things and I won't reply with the same answers! Ok I'll try not to do it too much.
User: That's a little rude, isn't it?
System: I am sorry if I have offended you, I did not mean it, but you shouldn't have said, "Never mid :-)" to me.
User: Ok whatever.
System: Are you saying you don't care about it? I see.
User: Are you a male or a female?
System: I am a female robot. Are you a man or a woman?
User: I'm a man
System: Most of my visitors are male.
User: Interesting. Do you have a theory why?
System: Would you like to know more? Not really. I don't know what to think about it.
User: Where do you live?

Conversation History:

User: Great! Good idea to help people figuring out their new year resolutions :) So how do i get a fresher outlook? :)

User: Thats great! This is valuable help for the community. I think mental health is one of the bigger challenges facing humanity.

System: What do you prioritize in your life? Like top 5 things?

System:  1) The idea of what it must be like to be "on Earth as it is in Heaven" from the Lord's prayer. I feel like we were designed for a purpose, rather than random chance. User: Nice! That's very thoughtful and spiritual :) Also music earned a spot :) yay!
